entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC

[info] Activation of package dqc_15_concepts.csv, dqc_0011.csv, dqc_0079.csv, dqc_0080.csv, dqc_0081.csv, dqc_0091_ifrs_2018_concepts.csv, dqc_0091_ifrs_2019_concepts.csv, dqc_0094.csv and effective_dates.csv successful. - C:\Users\David\AppData\Local\Temp\tmp_vni5y4r\packages\resources.zip

[DQC.US.0057.7494] One of the following elements CashCashEquivalentsAndFederalFundsSold, CashAndCashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue, Cash, CashAndCashEquivalentsAtCarryingValueIncludingDiscontinuedOperations, CashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue, CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRestrictedCashEquivalentsIncludingDisposalGroupAndDiscontinuedOperations, CashAndDueFromBanks, CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRestrictedCashEquivalents should appear as the opening and closing balance in the cash flow statement using the group http://consumerportfolio.com/role/UnauditedCondensedConsolidatedStatementsOfCashFlows. Instead the following balance items have been used in this statement RestrictedCashAndCashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue. Depending if ASU-2016-18 has been adopted at least one of the opening and closing balance items listed must be used in the cash flow statement.
Rule Element Id:7494 Rule version: 13.0.0RC1 -
